text: June 12 Facebooks deal for popular GIF website Giphy has caught the eye of UKs competition watchdog, which said on Friday it had begun a probe into the deal for possibly reducing competition in the United Kingdom.The Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) has invited comments on the transaction from any interested party. (bit.ly/2B0CX4s) (Reporting by Shanima A in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel)
